name: AstroNite (itch)
description: My name is Logan and I love making games & entertaining people! I've been working on games since I was 14 years old and I am now 25! I wanted to make a simple mobile game so I decided to take an idea like Asteroids but host contests in game and giveaway money every month to the winner on the leaderboard! So far I've given away a total of $200 in the game and looking to grow the game and get more feedback!
